title: WATCH: Top 10 places with secrets we are dying to know
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

There are some mysteries that no amount of internet sleuthing can solve.

For this list, Mojo will be looking at some of the most well-guarded, exclusive, and private places in the world, where any number of untold secrets might very well be hidden.

One particularly famous site - Area 51 - recently made it into the news after a group of online jokers started a campaign to raid the secretive site and 'free the aliens'. Luckily, they were mostly dissuaded by doing something so foolish.

Strap on your tinfoil hat and dive into this conspiracy-fueled video.

WATCH: Why are so many Egyptian statues missing their nose?

description: There are some mysteries that no amount of internet sleuthing can solve.
